# Repository Description for GitHub About Section

## Suggested Description

**An AI-powered tool that generates algorithmic trading strategies using multiple frontier and open-source language models including GPT-4o, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Gemini 2.5 Pro, CodeQwen, and CodeGemma.**

## How to Apply This Description

This description should be added to the GitHub repository's "About" section. Here are the ways to do this:

### Option 1: GitHub Web Interface (Easiest)
1. Go to the repository page on GitHub
2. Click the ⚙️ (gear/settings icon) next to "About" on the right sidebar
3. Paste the description in the "Description" field
4. Optionally add topics: `ai`, `trading`, `llm`, `algorithmic-trading`, `gpt`, `claude`, `gemini`, `machine-learning`, `finance`, `python`
5. Click "Save changes"

### Option 2: GitHub CLI
```bash
gh repo edit --description "An AI-powered tool that generates algorithmic trading strategies using multiple frontier and open-source language models including GPT-4o, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Gemini 2.5 Pro, CodeQwen, and CodeGemma."
```

### Option 3: GitHub API
```bash
curl -X PATCH \
  -H "Authorization: token YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN" \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/AsutoshaNanda/llm-trading-strategy-generator \
  -d '{"description":"An AI-powered tool that generates algorithmic trading strategies using multiple frontier and open-source language models including GPT-4o, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Gemini 2.5 Pro, CodeQwen, and CodeGemma."}'
```

## Alternative Shorter Description (if character limit is an issue)

**AI-powered algorithmic trading strategy generator using GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini, CodeQwen, and CodeGemma with real-time market data.**
